title.narrative: Haiti Post-Disaster Partial Credit Guarantee Program Support Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to support the development of a partial credit guarantee program by the Recipient to help (i)financial institutions restart lending; and (ii) financial sector borrowers overcome the impact of the Emergency.
